Title: Apollo
Description: This project serves as a solution to a simple but highly productive, performant and extensible MVVM framework for Windows Store (Windows Runtime) Apps.
HomeWiki:
Apollo: A Light-weighted Framework for Productive Development of Data Heavy MVVM Windows Store Apps
This project serves as a solution to a simple but highly productive, performant and extensible MVVM framework for Windows Store (Windows Runtime) Apps.

This is a framework in the form of Windows Store library that has proven useful for creating apps with interactive UI and frequent and complicated data interactions compliant with MVVM pattern.
